title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing chocolate in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Chocolate in a dream indicates good luck and hearing good news, just as chocolate indicates well-being and stopping stress and pain. Chocolate is considered one of the best sweets for adults and children, especially for children. Chocolate is cakes, biscuits, etc., sweets for decoration and many other sweets. Chocolate is included in the production of many sweets, but beware. When you see chocolate in your dream, it has a different interpretation and meaning than reality. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate in a dream. A dream that you saw chocolate in a dream. Interpretation scholars reported that the interpretation of a dream about chocolate indicates that it is beautiful. For those who saw that they were eating chocolate in a dream, the dream showed that the dreamer is waiting for him with a lot of money. As for whoever sees himself buying chocolate in his dream, the dream indicates that he will meet a new friend. Distributing chocolate in a dream can represent love, warm feelings, happy times, and good news. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a single woman. A dream about seeing chocolate in a dream. Chocolate in a dream represents a happy moment, whether it is an engagement. Or a wedding, white or dark chocolate will bring her happiness. An unmarried woman sees that she is eating delicious chocolate in her dream, this means that her wishes will come true. However, if the single woman sees someone offering her chocolate, her dream indicates that she will marry this person. Dream of seeing Chocolate in a dream But if a single woman sees in a dream that someone is stealing chocolate from her, then the dream indicates something that she hates, such as losing her lover or canceling her engagement. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a married womanIf a married woman sees that someone is offering her chocolate in a dream, then the dream It heralds good news that she is about to become pregnant. However, if a married woman sees a dead person giving her chocolate in a dream, the dream indicates that she will get a new home. Dream of seeing chocolate in a dream If a married woman sees that she is eating a lot of chocolate in her dream, then her dream It proves that she earns a lot of money. If a married woman sees in a dream someone stealing chocolate, the dream indicates divorce due to a dispute with her older husband. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a pregnant woman: She saw in her dream a pregnant woman giving her a gift of chocolate and the dream shows her the sex of the fetus. A dream about seeing Chocolate in a dream: If the chocolate is white, then her dream indicates the birth of a female. Dark chocolate, her dream indicates the birth of a child. Dream Interpretation Seeing chocolate in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates happiness and abundance. However, if a dead pregnant woman is seen distributing chocolate, her dream will come With good news after her birth. Interpretation of a dream about chocolate for a man: A dream about seeing chocolate in a dream: Seeing chocolate means happiness, pleasure and an easy life. A single man saw chocolate in his dream and this is good news. As for married men who saw chocolatiers specializing in chocolate for their children, he explained

title: Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream is one of the visions that many people promise, especially since berries are fruits with a delicious taste that can help treat many diseases. There are many indications and meanings of berries that we can learn about in this article about the most famous scholars in interpreting dreams for a man or for a man, an unmarried girl, a married woman or a pregnant woman, but we must always emphasize. However, it is important not to infer or reject any interpretation that we report about any vision in relation to any other vision in which there is a similarity, so that there is no problem for the dreamer because the interpretation of the vision must be in front of a dream interpreter who has legal knowledge sitting in front of the dreamer and learning from him many details to be able to interpret the vision accurately. Read also: Toilet in a dream Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing berries in a dream The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing berries in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that herald success for the student. As for the merchant who sees berries in a dream, this may indicate the profits that the merchant will be able to reap during the coming period - God willing -. In addition to a woman seeing berries in a dream, this may be a sign that she loves her husband. Ibn Sirin also says that seeing berries in a dream from the market may indicate an abundance of goods, and God knows best. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream Seeing berries in a single woman's dream An unmarried girl who sees berries in a dream is considered a person for her who will marry soon - God willing -. Also, cranberries in a dream for an unmarried girl can be a sign of a brave and religious young man who will get her And God knows best. In addition, berries in an unmarried girl’s dream may be a sign that she is suffering from an illness, but she will recover from it soon – God willing. Seeing berries in a dream for a man A person who sees berries in a dream, this is one of the indications that this person – God willing – will be blessed with good offspring. Just like a man who sees himself in a dream buying berries from the market, this may be a sign of the success that he will be able to achieve in the coming period. As for planting berries in a dream, this may indicate the wealth and profit that he will gain – God willing -. As for eating berries in a man’s dream, it may be a harbinger of his success in projects or in obtaining money or a happy marriage. Read also: Penguin in a dream Seeing berries in a dream for a married woman A married woman sees berries in a dream, this may be one of the signs and indications for her that she will become pregnant soon – God willing – and God knows best. Also, if a married woman dreams of red berries, this may indicate a strong love for her husband. In addition to a married woman dreaming of cranberries, this may be an indication of the husband’s good treatment of her. Also, berries in a married woman’s dream can be An indication of the stable married life that she enjoys. Seeing berries in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman who sees blueberries in a dream may have this

title: Interpretation of a dream about obtaining a gold bullion in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of obtaining a gold bullion in a dream When searching for an interpretation of the dream of obtaining a gold bullion in a dream, many wanted to know the interpretation of this vision. Let us get to know the interpretation of some diligent scholars. The translators and the reader should know that it is from the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining a gold bullion In a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he has obtained an ingot of gold may indicate the abundance of sustenance that will come to the dreamer in the coming period. The dream of obtaining a gold ingot in a dream may indicate the happy events that come to the dreamer during this time, thanks to God. Seeing an ingot of Gold in a dream may indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. If someone sees that he has obtained an alloy of gold, this may indicate his closeness to God Almighty, and getting rid of sins and disobedience, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of obtaining On a prayer rug in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he took a prayer rug may indicate the strength of his faith and connection to religion. A person’s dream that he took a prayer rug in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s good circumstances during this time. Whoever dreams that he took a prayer rug may indicate facilitation of matters and positive changes. Which occurs in his life in those days. In the event that a person sees that he took a prayer rug in a dream, this may indicate the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and goals in that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting a watermelon from someone in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he got Watermelon, may indicate the dreamer's achievements during that period. Whoever sees that he took a watermelon from someone may indicate that he heard happy news about the dreamer in those days. In case one believes that he took a watermelon from someone, it may indicate happiness and joy that The dreamer feels it during this period. Seeing watermelon being taken by someone in a dream may indicate happy events and good changes in the dreamer’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of receiving chicken eggs in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he received chicken eggs To indicate positive changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this period. In the event that there is a personal opinion that he obtained chicken eggs in a dream, this can indicate a lot of money that the dreamer obtains during this period. In the event that there is a personal opinion that he obtained Chicken eggs in a dream, this could indicate getting rid of the fears and problems that the dreamer was facing at that time. Seeing eggs taken in a dream could indicate happy events and positive changes occurring to the dreamer in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about getting pants in A dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is wearing pants, it may indicate the happiness that the dreamer will gain in the coming days. Whoever sees in a dream that he took pants from someone, it may indicate that he will be freed from sins and sins and will become closer to God Almighty. Wearing pants in a dream may indicate It indicates happy events that will come to the dreamer during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about receiving a bouquet of

title: I dreamed that I gave money to children

preview.html: I dreamed that I gave money to children through a website. Seeing the website roy2a.com is one of the happiest moments for many children is when they give someone a gift or give them money to buy what they love, it makes them feel grateful and concerned about those around them, as a result and interpretation of seeing donating money to children in Dreams about the face of the dreamer. This is what we will explain in this article by presenting the most important interpretations provided by the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Shaheen, and others. So follow us. I dreamed that I gave money to children. The vision of giving money in a dream to children is a good vision and it indicates the good and kind qualities that the dreamer has, such as helpfulness, kindness, and a tender heart. The vision of giving money to children in a dream indicates to a married woman that a lot of goodness and happiness will come to her life in the coming period. Dreaming about giving money to children indicates that the viewer will overcome the financial crises that he is going through during this period. Giving money to children in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries and sorrows and overcoming the crises and problems that the dreamer is going through. Seeing donating money to children in a dream for the merchant and business owner indicates that there will be profits and gains. And he expanded his business in the coming period. I dreamed that I gave money to children by Ibn Sirin. Seeing donating money to children in a dream indicates positive changes that the divine will see in his next life. Dreaming of giving money to children indicates that abundant food and a lot of goodness will come in the life of the dreamer. Giving money to children in The dream indicates tolerance, kindness, generosity, and good qualities of the dreamer. The dream of giving money to children indicates that the viewer thinks a lot about the problems and crises that can occur due to living conditions. Seeing them giving money to children in a bag is a statement of a secret that is entrusted to the dreamer and kept. I dreamed that I gave money to children for single people. Seeing giving Broken magazines or money for children in one's dream indicate bad morals and bad relationships with those around them. A dream about giving good money to children means unmarried women enjoying the purity of intention and the goodness it brings to those around them. Giving money to children to one of us indicates an improvement in their financial situation in the near future. The dream indicates Who gives money to children to one's dream means that there are changes in her life coming for the better. I dreamed that I gave money to children to a married woman. Seeing yourself giving money to children in a married dream can be a sign of her lack of need and emotional attention. Meaning of giving money to children in a dreamIn the widespread discussion about the priest The condition of money in a dream is what explains good or bad speech. I dreamed that I gave children money to a pregnant woman. The vision of giving silver money to children in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the gender of her fetus is male, and God knows best. As for the vision of giving children gold money in a pregnant woman’s dream, a birthmark is female. Giving bills to children in A pregnant woman's sleep is good news

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for married, single, pregnant and divorced women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for married, single, pregnant and divorced women. Many of us wonder about the interpretation of a vision or dream that comes in a dream and therefore we will put in your hands information about the interpretation of the dream above, interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a married woman looking forward to a happy future and a happy life with her lover, or interpretation of a dream With a wedding dress for a married woman or one of her relatives wearing a white wedding dress indicates that wealth is on her way and that there is something wonderful, we will explain that later. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a married woman Ibn Sirinson We will explain to you some interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a married woman in the following: Interpretation of a dream The wedding dress for a woman who married Ibn Sirin indicates the end of a stage in the field of work or study, as well as family life and the beginning of a new life or a new stage. But if an unmarried girl sees her white wedding dress in a dream and feels happy and calm inside, this is a sign that she is already married or She has a new job. Also, the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a woman married to Ibn Sirin indicates that she will enter a new stage of education such as university, but it will benefit her even if she is sad or mentally stressed, as this indicates that the fact that the person who is emotionally attached to her is facing some difficulties and thus affects her His mental state and makes him see her in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about wedding dresses for single women. We will explain to you some interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a single woman in the following: Interpretation of a dream about a white wedding dress for a single woman indicates secrecy and religiosity. If it is known that the one who married her is a sign of his good reputation. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she is wearing a white wedding dress on her wedding day with another person, this means that this person does not belong to her. Interpretation of dreams about the fiancée’s wedding dress. We will explain to you some interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress in the following: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for the bride testifies to Her mental purity, and if she feels happy while wearing the dress, this indicates the approaching date of her wedding. The interpretation of a dream about the bride’s wedding dress also indicates the intensity of her daughter’s husband’s love for her and that she lived a good life after marrying him. If the bride dreams of losing her wedding dress, this indicates the presence of Some marital disturbances that may ultimately lead to the dissolution of the marriage. If the bride sees a white wedding dress in her dream, this is evidence of her good morals and the happiness of her bride with her. The interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress also indicates that she lives a good life with this man and fears God when dealing with him. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced womanWe will explain to you some interpretations related to the interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman in the following: The interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman shows goodness, vitality, marriage, and dress. The interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a divorced woman also shows the goodness of this world and religion for a divorced woman. Interpretation of a dream about a dress A wedding for a divorced woman indicates the disappearance of sadness and change

title: Interpretation of seeing soft drinks in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing soft drinks in a dreamInterpretation of the meaning of a dream about soft drinks in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen Today on our website we present to you everything that is new and distinctive in this article Interpretation of seeing a dream about a dream A dream about Nabulsi, to learn more on the Mohazat website. You can see Interpretation of a dream about seeing a ringInterpretation of a dream about need falling into a dreamDream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking soft drinks, this means that she will obtain a lot of livelihood without effort. However, if a woman sees in her dream that she is washing herself with soda, this indicates that she is suffering. From severe neglect in her home. But if she sees that he is offering it to guests in her home, this indicates that she will go through a state of sadness, but it will not last long. Dream interpretation jurists say: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is drinking carbonated water, this means that she She will live a period of calm and satisfaction in her life, but if she sees that she is bathing with it, this indicates that she will lose a lot of money. But if she sees that she is drinking soft drinks greedily, this indicates her desire to achieve many ambitions in her life, or if she sees that she is offering it to guests, then this It indicates that she will be healthy after giving birth and you will be too. Getting a lot of living without any fatigue. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing soft drinks in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the stability of her romantic situation, but if she sees herself in her dream drinking soft drinks, this means that she will get married soon, and this indicates her overwhelming happiness in life. she has. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is drinking soft drinks greedily, this means that she wants to explore many dreams and desires. Interpretation of a dream about soft drinks by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of drinking soft drinks in a dream as a symbol of success and excellence for the pioneer in his life. As for the vision of drinking soft drinks Quickly and greedily, it suggests that the dreamer has many ambitions that he seeks to achieve but fails. title: Interpretation of a dream about buying gifts in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing buying gifts in a dream is a good vision, which often brings good omens to the fortuneteller, but sometimes it can bring bad omens, and this depends on the dream itself and the symbols in it. You may also know the toilet in a dream, the science of dreams needs to be studied, seen and insightful so that a person can interpret dreams accurately. Seeing many gifts in a dream Seeing many gifts in a dream means many surprises in the dreamer's life. If you see someone giving a gift to another, this means that misfortune comes to him because he gave him all the good opportunities to the one who gave him the gift, and God knows best. But if you see a stranger giving him a gift, this means that the visionary has good behavior and a good personality. If you see someone giving many gifts to another person, this means that he is pressuring him with certain demands and accusations. Receiving a gift in a dream indicates that the dreamer is loved. Seeing gifts by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Ibn Sirin mentions the words of God Almighty: (And I send them a gift, so see how the messengers will return) interpreting the vision of a gift in a dream, and it is clear that it relates to engagement, engagement and marriage. So Queen Perks sent a gift to our master Solomon and then proposed to marry her. Therefore, when he sees giving and receiving gifts, it indicates his approach to marriage or his father's approach if he is married. Ibn Sirin also shows reconciliation with the person who gave him the gift in a dream, especially if the gift means love and affection, especially if the two have been suffering from problems or hatred for a long time. Read also: Toilet in a dream Interpretation of seeing gifts in a dream Read also: Washing the dead The vision of buying gifts in a dream can be interpreted with more than one indication, as follows, as seeing many gifts in a dream indicates many surprises that will happen to the dreamer during the coming period of his life. Seeing that someone gives a gift to another person means that the dreamer will suffer from problems because he did all the good things to the one who gave the gift. The interpretation of a person seeing someone who does not know to give him a gift is that the dreamer has good morals and that everyone around him loves him. Seeing someone giving another many gifts means that he wants something from this person and pays him. Seeing yourself receiving a gift in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is a person loved by everyone, and the dream of many gifts indicates that the dreamer should not miss any opportunity that comes his way to excel and achieve what he wants. Seeing receiving a gift of a book from someone interprets the arrival of good news for the monarch, and if the gift is flowers, this is a sign of success and fulfillment of desires. Ibn Sirin says that the gift expresses love and understanding, and also indicates reconciliation

title: What is the complete interpretation of the dream of money in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing money in a dream entirely through Hadot? Money is one of the main things in our whole life and we cannot give it up, because it is the foundation of everything that exists on earth and seeing money or money in a dream is one of the dreams of many. People are looking for them these days. Seeing all of the money in a dream is one of the strange dreams that can make the dreamer have questions about the interpretation of this vision. If you are interested in knowing the complete interpretation of seeing money in a dream, you should follow the article. Why dream of seeing silver coins? Seeing a silver coin in a dream is complete is one of the good dreams associated with the dreamer of goodness and life. Likewise, the symbol of the coin in the dream is complete, as it is considered lawful money that benefits the dreamer in His life. Also, seeing silver equipment in a dream indicates good deeds and many good deeds that the dreamer has done to please his Lord, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a corpse in a dream? Why do single people dream of paper money? It is said that when an unmarried woman sees in a dream full of money And coins, this indicates the despair that the girl is experiencing in her life, and it also shows her lack of self-confidence. Seeing paper money in a lonely girl’s dream promises a lot of goodness and food that the girl will earn in her next life. Also, seeing coins in a girl’s dream means that she will face Problems and difficulties that the girl will go through in her next life, and God knows best. See also: Why dream of a wallet in a dream? Why dream of seeing money for a married woman? Seeing coins in a married woman’s dream indicates the needs of that woman in her married life. Also, seeing paper money in a married woman’s dream indicates Stability and family happiness. To see gold coins in a woman’s dream above her successor to a man, and vice versa, to see silver coins indicates a woman’s succession, and God knows best. Finding money in a completed dream for a married woman indicates the presence of a loyal friend, and losing money in a married woman’s dream indicates On the loss of her beloved friend, and God knows best. See also: Why do you dream of seeing a work completed in a dream? Why does a pregnant woman dream of a paper bill? Seeing banknotes in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of the health of her fetus and herself. Likewise, seeing gold coins in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates... That she gave birth to a male child, while the opposite vision appears for a pregnant woman who sees silver coins in her breastfeeding child, and God knows what is inside them. Matrix. If a pregnant woman sees in a dream that someone is giving her money, this indicates that she will give birth to a son, and God knows best. To see money in general in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates kindness and support, whether it is paper or money, and God knows best. See also : Why dream of seeing gold in a dream is complete. Ibn Sirin.If you have a dream that you would like to interpret, leave it in a comment below and our team will respond to you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking a long road in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of walking on a long road by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the vision of walking in a dream can indicate good circumstances and the abundance of sustenance and lawful money. Also, the vision of walking or walking on a long road may indicate that the dreamer is committing many sins and transgressions and repents to God Almighty. As This vision indicates achieving goals and achieving success and academic excellence for the student if he dreams of walking in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about walking a long road alone. Seeing an unmarried woman in her dream that she is walking in a very far place indicates the emergence of some crises in her life from which she will be freed. It is also Seeing her walking on a long road indicates the collapse of her worries and problems that she suffers from in the coming period and after the end, God willing. Also, seeing her walking on a long road may indicate excellence and success in her academic and professional life and she will excel at the highest levels. Seeing her walking long distances on a road A long dream indicates happiness, many joys that will happen in her life, and good news. Interpretation of a dream about walking on a long road for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a vision of walking a long road, this indicates the fulfillment of her desires and goals that she is trying to achieve, and God knows best. This vision may indicate It also indicates that she will be pregnant soon, and that her children will enter private schools, and her husband’s prestigious job and the money and many means that he will provide for her. Also, seeing a woman walking a long road can lead to marital happiness, the collapse of the disputes that occur between her and her husband, and hope in life, and God knows best. Interpretation A dream about walking on a long road for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is walking on a long, endless road, this indicates that all her worries and problems have stopped. Also, the dream that she is walking on a long road may indicate the presence of a large number of burdens in her life and also indicates Facilitating her affairs and an easy and easy birth. Interpretation of the vision of walking a long road for a man. Seeing a man in his dream seeing a vision of walking a long road means the disappearance of his worries and his next life will be easy and bad at work or in his life, and God knows best. Also, seeing him walking a long road and paths indicates his close marriage. From a good girl whom he loved in the past and the happiness that he will meet. This vision also indicates the abundance of a person’s livelihood, the collapse of marital disputes and problems in his life, and the longevity of his life and the life of his children, God willing. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will Reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a volcano

preview.html: When you dream of volcanoes, pay attention to their location and timing. Is the volcano about to explode? Is the volcano completely inactive? Will a volcano explode and erupt lava from the mountain? These small details provide insight into why you dream about volcanoes and how they could relate to you. Here is the interpretation of a dream about a volcanoInterpretation of a dream about a volcanoVolcanoes symbolize power, inevitability, destruction, anger, emotions, unresolved issues, revenge, and unexpected circumstances. If you see a volcano in your dream, it may mean that you are feeling anxious or stressed. Dreaming about a volcano that is about to erupt means that your anxiety will increase, which may It results in significant damage if left unchecked. Seeing a volcano or an ash cloud in a dream can indicate a destination or a place you want to be, and a volcano can be a destination or the end of a journey or adventure you are sharing. If your dream includes a volcano in the place you want Traveling to it, it may mean that your hard work or research will finally pay off. Seeing a volcano in a dream can be associated with your creativity and transformation, so if you are starting a new path in life or starting a new project and dream of a volcano, it means that you should not be afraid to make changes New. New decisions and learn to unleash your creativity.Volcanoes in a dream often symbolize the dreamer's emotional outbursts, which are usually explosions.Volcanoes in a dream symbolize the dreamer's uncontrollable behavior and unexpected reactions. Perhaps the researcher is a person who loses his temper easily, or is under a lot of pressure at the present time and is about to explode.Interpretation of a dream about a volcanoInterpretation of seeing a volcano in a dreamA volcano in a dream often reveals violent feelings and emotions that are hidden and ready to explode, and this may sometimes be a good thing because it helps you On removing negativity within you. People who are under extreme stress due to some external or other circumstances around them often dream of volcanic eruptions. In some cases, dreaming of a volcano can symbolize a sudden and unexpected event that will have a devastating impact on your life, changing it completely. Often Dreams about volcanoes symbolize refusal to recognize some warnings and signs and failure to recognize problems. A person often dreams of volcanoes in situations where he fears a possible conflict with someone due to some issues that need to be discussed with this person, so the owner of the vision can expect a violent reaction that does not It can be controlled by this person, so dreaming of a volcano Dreams about volcanoes warn us against anger and warn us to avoid confrontations in the coming days, but if conflict is inevitable, it is important to try to resolve it as calmly as possible. Dreams about volcanoes warn us that we are going through a difficult time in our lives, Especially in our love life. Disagreements and misunderstandings with loved ones will be possible during these periods and it is important to try to avoid them as much as possible. Interpretation of a dream about an inactive volcano If you dream of an inactive volcano, this dream often reveals some
